price: (Wei yε) adom a efiri wo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ. Ɛno ne nkonimdie kεseε paa no.
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faḍlan min rabbika dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
